message.raw: Modified quad_driver calibration to force the control voltage to 0 when commanding 0 A or 0 G/cm. The conversions are no longer unitary, but it will help with getting the IGBT gate voltages low (-0.1V) and hence turning them off when we want zero current in the quad coils.
